unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi reported a peculiar case this week: a patient, identified only as Mr. Sharma, forgot he disliked karela. Yes, folks, neurological anomaly led to amnesia... about disliking bitter gourd! Docs are baffled, running tests like EEGs and MRIs (â‚¹8000 a pop, ouch!) to understand what went haywire in his brain wiring. Neurosurgeon Dr. Gupta, MD, PhD, joked it might be a miracle cure for picky eaters.
normalised: A-I-I-M-S Delhi reported a peculiar case this week: a patient, identified only as Mister Sharma, forgot he disliked karela. Yes, folks, neurological anomaly led to amnesia... about disliking bitter gourd! Docs are baffled, running tests like E-E-G-s and M-R-I-s (rupee eight thousand a pop, ouch!) to understand what went haywire in his brain wiring. Neurosurgeon Doctor Gupta, M-D, P-h-D, joked it might be a miracle cure for picky eaters.

unnormalised: Sharma, 45 yrs old, apparently devoured a whole bowl of karela sabzi, praising its "unique, refreshing flavour." His wife, Mrs. Sharma, suspects foul play, specifically, her mother-in-law's "special" recipe. Medically speaking, possibilities range from a minor TIA affecting taste perception to alien intervention (okay, maybe not the aliens, but Dr. Verma did raise an eyebrow). The report will be published in next month's issue of IJN - Indian Journal of Neurology.
normalised: Sharma, forty five years old, apparently devoured a whole bowl of karela sabzi, praising its "unique, refreshing flavour." His wife, Missus Sharma, suspects foul play, specifically, her mother-in-law's "special" recipe. Medically speaking, possibilities range from a minor T-I-A affecting taste perception to alien intervention (okay, maybe not the aliens, but Doctor Verma did raise an eyebrow). The report will be published in next month's issue of I-J-N - Indian Journal of Neurology.

unnormalised: This could revolutionize Indian households! Imagine kids suddenly craving palak paneer. Researchers are rushing to isolate the "karela-loving gene" or whatever's going on in Mr. Sharma's head. Stay tuned for updates on this groundbreaking (and hilarious) medical mystery. Will this lead to a world where everyone eats their veggies? One can only hope (and stock up on karela, just in case!).
